0000101111110100 1010111000011101 0 -> sum: 1011101000010001, cout: 0

0101000101000111 0100001110101000 0 -> sum: 1001010011101111, cout: 0
0101110111101011 0001000100110011 0 -> sum: 0110111100011110, cout: 0
1110100000001000 1010011011111100 1 -> sum: 1000111100000101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
